summary: Adds an enormous rideable waterfall to Throat of the World
descriptionHtml:
Some of you may remember my previous mod, Whiterun Water Park. After I released that mod I got a lot of requests to build something similar at Throat of the World. Only a crazy person would try something as stupid as that.... so this is the result, a huge waterfall running from Throat of the World down to the river below. Its pretty simple, just fast travel to my new map marker at Throat of the World and jump on the rapids, try to stay alive (which isn\'t always easy) and if its a clear day, enjoy the fantastic view of Skyrim. And just to make it clear if you hadn\'t already guessed, no it is not lore friendly.

To install-
Its just the esp so copy it into your skyrim data folder

To uninstall-
Delete the esp from your data folder

Performance-
Due to the fact that you are travelling extremely fast on the rapids, some users ay experience some lagging

Compatibility Issues-
None that I know of however anything that changes Throat of the World could be an issue

Please report any bugs you find

Check out my other mods for Skyrim, Fallout 3 and Oblivion
Some are listed under the name Dremorakynval
author: Drakynval
